column1: Théodwyn was a noble woman of [[Rohan]], the sister of [[Théoden]], and the daughter of [[Thengel]] and [[Morwen Steelsheen]]. She was married to [[Éomund]] of [[Eastfold]] in {{TA
column2: 2989}}. Her son Éomer was born in {{TA
column4: n}}, and her daughter Éowyn in {{TA

column3: n}}. Not long after that Théodwyn died of illness. Théoden raised her two children after her death.<ref>{{App

column1: ''Théodwyn'' is [[Old English]] for "joy of the people".
